entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
